title: Is16gb ROM and 2gn RAM enough for Facebook apps and other commonly used apps ?
content: So I have had a serious concern about storage. Let's say I have 16gb ROM and 2gb RAM, is it enough for me to use big ups, like the big Facebook and it's messenger the big blue one ans other big apps like Instagram, Snapchat, and perhaps other apps. So my questions are how much system storage is considered enough for 16gb ROM phone to function properly
